TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit GenerateBootstrapper extends Microsoft.Build.Tasks.TaskExtension
Public NotInheritable Class GenerateBootstrapper Inherits TaskExtension
public ref class GenerateBootstrapper sealed : Microsoft::Build::Tasks::TaskExtension

summary.span: 實作 GenerateBootstrapper 工作。

span.span: Implements the GenerateBootstrapper task.

summary.span: 請使用專案檔中的 GenerateBootstrapper 項目，來建立和執行這項工作。

span.span: Use the GenerateBootstrapper element in your project file to create and execute this task.

summary.span: 如需用法和參數資訊，請參閱 [GenerateBootstrapper 工作](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca3ba2c6-d2ea-41f2-b7e3-0fc2b0730460)。

span.span: For usage and parameter information, see [GenerateBootstrapper Task](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ca3ba2c6-d2ea-41f2-b7e3-0fc2b0730460).

summary.span: 取得或設定在安裝所有必要條件之後，啟動載入器 (Bootstrapper) 將用來開始安裝應用程式的檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets the file the bootstrapper will use to begin the installation of the application after all prerequisites have been installed.

span.span: The file the bootstrapper will use to begin the installation of the application after all prerequisites have been installed.

summary.span: 取得或設定啟動載入器將安裝的應用程式名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the application that the bootstrapper will install.

value.span: 啟動載入器將安裝的應用程式名稱。

span.span: The name of the application that the bootstrapper will install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此名稱將在安裝期間出現於啟動載入器所使用的 UI 中。This name will appear in the UI the bootstrapper uses during installation.

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示當元件安裝在目標電腦上時，是否以更高的使用權限執行。

span.span: Gets or sets whether a component runs with elevated permissions when it is installed on a target computer.

value.span: 如果安裝的元件是以更高的使用權限執行則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the installed component runs with elevated permissions; otherwise .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定在專案檔中，但它不會公開在 MSBuild 結構描述。This property can be set in the project file, but it is not exposed in the MSBuild schema. 在專案檔的`MsiBootstrapper`區段中，將[RequiresElevation 屬性](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/bb384030(v=vs.100))至`True`。In the project file's `MsiBootstrapper` section, set the [RequiresElevation Property](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/visualstudio/visual-studio-2010/bb384030(v=vs.100)) to `True`. 寫入登錄機碼或安裝至 GAC 時，元件會以更高權限執行。A component runs with elevated permissions when it writes a registry key or is being installed to the GAC. 例如，如果您要安裝組件至 GAC，您需要將此屬性設定為`True`。For example, if you are installing assemblies to the GAC, you need to set this property to `True`.

span.span: RequiresElevation Property

summary.span: 取得或設定啟動載入器用來尋找要安裝之安裝必要條件的位置。

span.span: Gets or sets a location for the bootstrapper to look for installation prerequisites to install.

value.span: 啟動載入器用來尋找要安裝之安裝必要條件的位置。

span.span: The location for the bootstrapper to look for installation prerequisites to install.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可以有下列值：This property can have the following values:: - `HomeSite`︰表示必要條件已由元件廠商所裝載。`HomeSite`: Indicates that the prerequisite is being hosted by the component vendor. - `Relative`︰表示必要條件位於應用程式的相同位置。`Relative`: Indicates that the preqrequisite is at the same location of the application. - `Absolute`︰表示可在集中式 URL 中找到所有元件。`Absolute`: Indicates that all components are to be found at a centralized URL. 此值應該用於搭配`ComponentsUrl`屬性。This value should be used in conjunction with the `ComponentsUrl` property. 如果未指定 ，預設會使用 `HomeSite`。If is not specified, `HomeSite` is used by default.

span.span: if the bootstrapper should copy all output files to the path specified in the property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此參數的預設值為 `true`。The default value of this parameter is `true`.
